code: import{toast}from"react-toastify";export var removeFromWatchlist=function removeFromWatchlist(id){if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to remove this coin")){var items=localStorage.getItem("watchlist");var arr=JSON.parse(items);localStorage.setItem("watchlist",JSON.stringify(arr.filter(function(item){return item!=id;})));toast.success("".concat(id.slice(0,1).toUpperCase()+id.slice(1)," removed from the watchlist!"));}else{toast.error("Couldnt remove the coin from the watchlist!");}};
